Text.Page:
The remains of the gulas' victims are scattered around the Hungry Caverns Vaults. It won't bring them back or undo their suffering, but we owe it to them to return them to their homes.

Gather up those you can find and bring them back here. I'll handle the rest.
How we treat our dead says a lot about us as a society. I'm glad we've acted with honor. Thank you.
We should return these remains to their homes.
